text: Ratris Khel Chale 2 (transl. The Game Runs At Night 2) is a Marathi supernatural thriller drama series. ==Cast== * Madhav Abhyankar as Hari "Anna" Naik * Shakuntala Nare as Indumati "Mai" Naik * Apurva Nemlekar as Kumudini "Shevanta" Kamalakar Patankar * Sanjeevani Patil as Vatsala "Vachhi" Aaba Naik * Suhas Shirsat as Dattaram "Datta" Hari Naik * Mangesh Salvi as Madhav Hari Naik * Prajakta Wadye as Sarita Dattaram Naik * Namrata Pavaskar as Chhaya Hari Naik * Sainkeet Kamat as Abhiram Hari Naik * Dilip Bapat as Advocate Nene * Anil Gawde as Raghunath "Raghu" Gurav * Pralhad Kudtarkar as Pandu * Diksha Sonawane as Bhivari * Abhay Khadapkar as Aaba Naik * Sachin Shirke as Kashinath "Kashi" Aaba Naik * Mangal Rane as Shobha Kashinath Naik * Adish Paigude as Kamalakar Patankar * Hridaynath Jadhav as Chontya == Production == It was started from 14 January 2019. == Seasons == Season Episodes Originally Broadcast First aired Last aired 1 210 2 413 3 238 == Ratings == Week Year BARC Viewership Ref. TVT Rank Week 8 2020 2.6 5 Week 10 2020 2.7 5 == References == Category:2010s drama television series Category:2010s Indian television series Category:2019 Indian television series debuts Category:2020 Indian television series endings Category:Zee Marathi original programming
title: Ratris Khel Chale 2
